title: Sales Data
text:
import kagglehub
import polars as pl
from pathlib import Path

from desolate import DesolationForest

path = Path(kagglehub.dataset_download("thedevastator/unlock-profits-with-e-commerce-sales-data"))

data = (
    pl.scan_csv(path / "Amazon Sale Report.csv")
    .select([
        pl.col("Date"),
        pl.col("Fulfilment"),
        pl.col("Style"),
        pl.col("SKU"),
        pl.col("Category"),
        pl.col("Size"),
        pl.col("Courier Status"),
        pl.col("Qty"),
        pl.col("Amount"),
        pl.col("ship-city"),
        pl.col("ship-state"),
        pl.col("ship-postal-code"),
        pl.col("ship-country"),
        pl.col("promotion-ids"),
        # pl.col("B2B"),
    ])
).collect()

data.head()
